localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Hollider (Hologram + Collider) is a projection display that delivers an affordable holo experience, including holo calls and holo shows.
nodes.title: Hollider - A screen for holographic video calls, shows, and streams
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: The creator economy is booming and it's just the start. This podcast is filled with conversations from CEOs and VCs in the industry who see the future for creators and discuss what that future will look like.
nodes.title: The Creator Economy - Podcast that covers the techier side of creators.
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: Typecast is an online AI powered virtual voice actor service that works like a word processor. Type your script then select from over 150+ virtual voice actors to voice your content from anywhere at anytime.
nodes.title: Typecast 1.0 - AI powered virtual voice actors for content creators
nodes.author: Joe Crosby

nodes.excerpt: Composer is an automated trading platform that allows you to build a portfolio of hedge fund-like strategies. Use our no-code visual editor to create your own strategies or â€œfollowâ€ a vetted repository of strategies and put capital to work against them.
nodes.title: Composer - Giving retail investors access to hedge fund-like strategies
nodes.author: Ananda Aisola

nodes.excerpt: Insanely useful websites is a curated database and newsletter featuring useful websites, products and apps that you should know.
nodes.title: Insanely Useful Websites - Discover insanely useful websites you didn't know existed
nodes.author: Jaisal Rathee

nodes.excerpt: Sales superpowers for your Google Calendar. See in-depth sales lead research directly in your calendar. With Intro Sales Research youâ€™ll ask more insightful questions, uncover bigger problems to solve and close more deals.
nodes.title: Sales Research In GCal - Stop researching prospects before a meeting
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Start from a template and launch your website today. This can be a blog, personal website, landing page, help center and more.
nodes.title: Notion Website Pack - Build your next website in minutes with Notion
nodes.author: Easlo

nodes.excerpt: Eraser is an all-in-one ideation tool for distributed teams. Eraser allows users to communicate ideas at the speed of thought using a markdown note editor, a lightweight canvas. Use Eraser for brainstorming, diagramming, wireframing, and interviewing!
nodes.title: Eraser - A whiteboard that lets you focus on ideas
nodes.author: Shin Kim

nodes.excerpt: Nitro makes product translation easier - and faster - than ever before. >Translate strings into 70 languages at once >Human translations exclusively >60% of translations are ready within hours >Easy integration with API >Perfect for apps, games and websites
nodes.title: Nitro - Fast, professional translations by native speakers, open API
nodes.author: Margarita Shvetsova

nodes.excerpt: Ladder, the next-gen professional community platform, is now on iOS and Android! Find your community, share resources, engage in discussions, land your dream job, and form meaningful relationships with peers and mentors, all in the palm of your hands.
nodes.title: Ladder Mobile App - The next-gen professional community platform, now on mobile
nodes.author: Alexis Ohanian

nodes.excerpt: Albato Embedded is an easy low-code way to create integrations within your product. And new integrations to not yet connected apps can be built by anyone using the no-code integration builder tool and go live on your product within minutes.
nodes.title: Albato Embedded - Build client-facing integrations without coding
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: ğŸš€ Learn interface design faster and become a UI master! Discover practical tips with real examples, understand design, and what skills are essential to grow as a designer.
nodes.title: Master UI Design - Learn to create beautiful and usable interfaces
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

nodes.excerpt: Drop your CV and get your score via AI. A special algorithm will try to identify your skills, education, and work experience. Based on keywords for different jobs, you will get a rating for your CV. More CVs - more accurate the data! The maximum score is 10.
nodes.title: CheckCV - Just drop your resume and get your score by AI
nodes.author: Alex Fedorov

nodes.excerpt: Chatfully is one place for every chat. Centralize communication â€” from texts to web chat to social media â€” and share in team inboxes to follow-up in 1/3 the time. Chat with contacts 1-to-1, all together using campaigns, and assign roles to unlimited users.
nodes.title: Chatfully - All-in-one chat tool for teams - texting, web chat, & more
nodes.author: CJ Terral

nodes.excerpt: Select Star ( https://selectstar.com) is an automated data discovery platform that analyzes & documents your data. Select Star provides an easy-to-use data portal that everyone can use to find and understand data, saving data analysts hours of time every week.
nodes.title: SelectStar - Automated data catalog and discovery for modern data teams
nodes.author: Nik Graf

nodes.excerpt: Crafted by expert 3D modelers, Glorify Mockups present ultra-realistic 3D objects and fully customizable pre-made scenes. Get access to full editing options and exclusive libraries of mockup templates. Give your designs a touch of reality.
nodes.title: Mockups by Glorify - Bring your designs to life with stunning mockups
nodes.author: Omar Farook

nodes.excerpt: Launched a survey for your internal team - and then crickets? A dozen follow-ups to get responses? ğŸš« Out with traditional surveys. With Pulse, get instant feedback from your team right inside Slack & Teams ğŸ˜‡ Bonus: send/receive incognito pulses ğŸ˜
nodes.title: Pulse by EngageWith - Get instant feedback from your team on Slack & MS Teams

nodes.excerpt: Dim the brightness of monitors, wireless displays, iPad Sidecar and AirPlay displays using simple sliders in your menu bar. Lunar Lite is the lite version of Lunar, an app for controlling every aspect of your external monitors (https://lunar.fyi)
nodes.title: Lunar Lite - Brightness sliders for all your displays

nodes.title: Fonoster - The open-source alternative to Twilio

nodes.excerpt: Compose web-ready data transformations, visualizations, and predictions with the ease of drag-and-drop, powerful extensions, and a vibrant community.
nodes.title: Hal9 - Bring your data to life

nodes.title: Lili - Reverse engineer your health data and get back on track.

nodes.title: Sizze Figma plugin - Figma design to app code
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: AudioCipher is a melody generator app for music producers. It's designed to help musicians come up with new ideas. The interface lets you enter words and convert them, as if by magic, into MIDI notes. Drag your musical cryptogram into any DAW.
nodes.title: AudioCipher - Creative melody generator VST for music producers

nodes.excerpt: Identify rarities in NFT collections before theyâ€™re officially published, like a ninja in the night. Sign up, search for the collection you want to analyze, and get all the info you need. Then, earn an unlimited income by referring friends!
nodes.title: NFT Ninja - Identify rare & underpriced NFTs.
nodes.author: Logan Jory

nodes.excerpt: Linkwork is a free tool that enables collaborative web browsing by instant sharing of links between users in a "room". Using it you can: - Preview others' pages live - Sync a tab to a participant to automatically follow them - Chat on any web page
nodes.title: Linkwork - A free tool that enables collaborative & social web browsing

nodes.excerpt: Knack is an art marketplace creating business-minded artists that sell more art through data-driven recommendations and integrated tools. We help art lovers find a great investment and allow emerging artists to start and grow their creative careers on Knack.
nodes.title: Knack - A data-driven art marketplace for artist and art lovers

nodes.excerpt: Online guide to know your coffee!
nodes.title: Honest Coffee Guide - An online guide to know your coffee
